title: scikit-learn-contrib, an umbrella for scikit-learn related projects.
description: Together with other scikit-learn developers we've created an umbrella organization for scikit-learn-related projects named scikit-learn-contrib. The idea is for this organization to host projects that are deemed too specific or too experimental to be included in the scikit-learn codebase but still offer an API which is compatible with scikit-learn and â€¦
dc:creator: Fabian Pedregosa
